body:
Hey everyone!  Just recently I got unbanned, and I would like to start off fresh.  I know I did some pretty unforgiveable things in the past, but over the summer I feel like I`ve changed for the better, and I hope you guys forgive me :).



Anyways, enough of that, AMA :D
body_tagged:

replies.body: So why you hack, you have a reason behind it, want to be as good as others but can't, so you'd use modifications that are consider as hacking to improve your pvp by cheating, another pathetic person.

replies.body:
kk

It's funny because you're right, back then I was terrible at pvp and I was frustrated that I was always killed. I really didn't know how to minecraft properly. (I did know how to install mods *cough* youtube *cough*) When I said I hacked on mczone, I didn't really hack, all I had was this radar mod which I didn't know was illegal until I joined the mczone forums. I did hack on other servers (like hypixel and mineplex).
So you can call me pathetic if you want, because I don't care.
